Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: bri
Reviews.Content: I bought this laptop and it came yesterday. I Love it so much it has a really good graphics card for me to do things easily. I thought this laptop wasn't going to be really good cause of the picture quality. But it came out better than the actual picture. I recomed you all to buy this even if your not in a budget. (I am on the laptop right now)

Reviews.Title: HP Compaq 8510p
Reviews.Author: Bleacherman
Reviews.Content: I bought this as a refurb unit to replace my other laptop, a 17" Dell. I was tired of lugging the larger computer around and wanted something smaller. I figured a refurb buisness model would fill the bill and I was right.  Mine was sold by link-tronic memory through Amazon. The description was correct. I've had it a month and no complaints.

Reviews.Title: This seller is a scam
Reviews.Author: BUSAYO SUNDAY
Reviews.Content: This seller is a scam and am really bittered. as your post you said almost like new and 80GB HDD. But on getting the IT the Screen is bad. from the top is displaying like there is water poured on it.
